page.title: 13GIRL GUIDE HQ
page.content: The Guide camp at Cowley is the HQ of Gloucestershire. At the Guide HQ there are huts for the Brownies and fields for the Guides to camp in.The county council own all of the six acre camping area, the Girl Guide Assocat_ ion own the Brownie huts. About the same number of Guides and Brownies visit,but usually more Guides.About 2000 people come a year mostly between May and October.Mrs Chesborough who lives near the Guide camp helps when people are camping.There too few chil_ dren in this rural area to have a Guide unit. In the bad weather there are big shelters for the Guides to go in.All Guiders have some medical know- ledge,but the only real danger is the adders.All Guides and Brownies are advised to wear Wellingtons and people are seldom bitten.
